author: rbb
msg: In apr_assert_success, if the return code is ENOTIMPL, then make sure that
the output is correct.  Also, just test for equality with APR_SUCCESS.

author: rbb
msg: Make sure testproc cleans up after itself too.

author: rbb
msg: testmmap now cleans up all of its file descriptors correctly.

author: rbb
msg: We were leaking file descriptors from the testfile program.  That
interfered with testpoll on some platforms.  All tests need to clean up
after themselves.  testfile now finishes without any leaks.

author: wrowe
msg: Untested... but Ryan's assertion was correct, this should be static.
